java.lang.String addExporter(java.lang.String formatName)
                             throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                    java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Add an exporter instance with a given format name

Parameters:
formatName - in String, for example, 'text', 'xml'
Returns:
extension name as String
Throws:
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - no such class, thrown by ClassLoader
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - can't generate enum from the format name parameter
See Also:
Format

dispose

void dispose()
Garbage collection routine called when the cicada perspective is disposed

execute

void execute()
             throws au.gov.ansto.bragg.cicada.core.exception.NoneAlgorithmException
Excute the current loaded algorithm. User call this method after load a specific algorithm recipe file upon the current data signal, and setup the tuner.

Throws:
au.gov.ansto.bragg.cicada.core.exception.NoneAlgorithmException - no loaded algorithm

execute

void execute(Algorithm algorithm)
             throws au.gov.ansto.bragg.cicada.core.exception.NoneAlgorithmException
Deprecated. since V1.0

Excute an give algorithm (call process() method of the concrete processor).

Parameters:
algorithm - loaded algorithm upon a data signal
Throws:
au.gov.ansto.bragg.cicada.core.exception.NoneAlgorithmException - the algorithm is not loaded, or no data signal to work with

                         au.gov.ansto.bragg.cicada.core.exception.ExportException
Export any algorithm input/output signal to a certain file

Parameters:
filename - full path of the filename in String type
signal - as Object, can be either a GroupData, Variable, Array or primary array with at most 3 dimensions.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - illegal access to the file system
au.gov.ansto.bragg.cicada.core.exception.ExportException - failed to export data

signalExport

void signalExport(java.lang.String filename,
                  java.lang.Object signal,
                  boolean transpose)
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         au.gov.ansto.bragg.cicada.core.exception.ExportException
Export any algorithm input/output signal to a certain file

Parameters:
filename - full path of the filename in String type
signal - as Object, can be either a GroupData, Variable, Array or primary array with at most 3 dimensions.
transpose - flag of transposing the matrix
Throws:
java.io.IOException - illegal access to the file system
au.gov.ansto.bragg.cicada.core.exception.ExportException - failed to export data
